Source.Name: sbt
Source.Summary: Build tool for Scala, Java, and more
Source.Description: sbt is an open-source build tool for Scala and Java projects, similar to Apache's Maven and Ant. As of 2019, it was the build tool of choice for over 90% of Scala developers.

Package.Name: sbt
Package.Summary: Build tool for Scala, Java, and more
Package.Description: sbt is an open-source build tool for Scala and Java projects, similar to Apache's Maven and Ant. As of 2019, it was the build tool of choice for over 90% of Scala developers.
